diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Combined Pituitary Hormone Deficiency (CPHD) due to F88S mutation in PROP-1 gene
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient, a Brazilian girl, presented with short stature and deficiencies in growth hormone (GH), thyroid-stimulating hormone (TSH), prolactin (PRL), luteinizing hormone (LH), and follicle-stimulating hormone (FSH). Molecular analysis revealed a novel homozygous mutation (263T.C) in the PROP-1 gene leading to the F88S substitution, which was shown to impair the DNA binding and trans-activation capabilities of the PROP-1 protein.
